entities.description: The category of questions related to the usage of various inhalants for getting high.
Youth usage of glue, shoe polish, or toluene for getting high.
Youth usage of halothane, ether, or other anesthetics for getting high.
Youth usage of lacquer thinner or other paint solvents for getting high.
Youth usage of lighter gases such as butane or propane for getting high.
Youth usage of nitrous oxide or 'whippits' for getting high.
Response indicating the participant has used the substance.
Response indicating the participant has not used the substance.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the category of questions about inhalant usage.
Relates the inhalant usage category to questions about glue, shoe polish, or toluene.
Relates the inhalant usage category to questions about halothane, ether, or other anesthetics.
Relates the inhalant usage category to questions about lacquer thinner or other paint solvents.
Relates the inhalant usage category to questions about lighter gases such as butane or propane.
Relates the inhalant usage category to questions about nitrous oxide or 'whippits'.
